name: Scroll Certification
description: Validates that the Immersive Scrolling Auditor has certified the essay with ≥8.0/10 score, 60fps confirmed, and mobile verified. Certification report must not indicate failure.

any_of.description: Scroll certification report from Immersive Scrolling Auditor

validations.description: Scroll certification must not have FAIL status in frontmatter
Scroll certification must not report overall failure
Frontmatter status must not be FAIL (parsed from YAML)

notes: G7 validates that the Immersive Scrolling Auditor has tested scroll-lock behavior, animation performance (60fps target), mobile Safari compatibility, and real device testing. The certification score (≥8.0/10 to pass) and any Tier 1 failures are recorded in the report. No Tier 1 failures are allowed. The not_contains checks now resolve to the actual existing any_of file, preventing silent bypass when the report is at a different path.
